content:
Detailed Guidelines on DGFT & Foreign Trade Services

Formation of Special Export Units - 
EOU (Export Oriented Units) – Duty-free imports of raw materials, capital goods; 100% export obligation.
STPI (Software Technology Parks of India) – For IT/ITES companies; income tax benefits (earlier), duty benefits, simplified compliance.
BTP (Bio-Technology Parks) – Incentives for biotech research, testing, and export.
EHTP (Electronic Hardware Technology Parks) – For hardware/semiconductor manufacturing.
SEZ (Special Economic Zones) – Complete ecosystem with fiscal benefits, customs duty exemption, single-window clearance.

DGFT & Foreign Trade Services – Guidelines Table:
